page.title: 13Y.H.A.
page.content: The Y.H.A.stands for Youth Hostel Association.People stay there for the night.26 people can stay at the youth hostel.For one night you have to pay Â£3.05.There are 2 kitchens one for the people who live there and one for the hostelers. The hostelers have to cook their own food and in the morning they have to make their own beds.In the morning they have to do jobs like sweeping a room wash-up-dishes or gardening etc.The hostelers who stay there travel from Hostels at Ely, Grantham, Lincoln,Kings Lynn etc.The hostelers who stay there are Americans Australians Japanese and English.There is a gift shop which you can buy Mugs tea towels wallets bagdes stickers books and posters.In 1 year 2000 people stayed at the hostel.Our youth hostel is in the High Street.There is a sign outside.
